title: Gel Press Impressables 7 inch X7 inch Embossed Gel Plate By Jen Starr Rose Mandala
short_description: Gel Press Impressables 7 inch X7 inch Embossed Gel Plate By Jen Starr Rose Mandala - With Gel Press plates, you get all of the benefits of gelatin printing but none of the downsides. Perfect for cardmaking, papercrafts and mixed media. Easy to use and clean! This package contains one 7x7 inch gel plate.
